features.title: 500+ Exciting Levels
features.description: Challenge yourself with hundreds of unique puzzle levels that get progressively more challenging. Each level brings new challenges and exciting gameplay mechanics.

features.title: Wild Animal Collection
features.description: Discover and match beautiful safari animals with unique abilities and special powers. From majestic lions to graceful giraffes, each animal has its own personality.

features.title: Powerful Boosters
features.description: Unlock and use amazing boosters to clear difficult levels and achieve higher scores. Strategic use of boosters can turn impossible levels into exciting victories.

features.title: Stunning Safari Graphics
features.description: Immerse yourself in beautiful safari landscapes with vibrant colors and smooth animations. Every visual element is crafted to enhance your gaming experience.

features.title: Achievement System
features.description: Track your progress with a comprehensive achievement system. Unlock special rewards and showcase your puzzle-solving skills to friends and family.

features.title: Multiple Game Modes
features.description: Enjoy various game modes including Classic, Time Attack, and Puzzle Challenge. Each mode offers a unique twist on the classic match-3 gameplay.

instructions.title: Match Three or More
instructions.description: Connect three or more identical animal blocks in a row or column to make them disappear. The more blocks you match, the higher your score!

instructions.title: Create Special Combinations
instructions.description: Match four or more blocks to create powerful special blocks that can clear entire rows or columns. These special blocks are key to solving difficult levels.

instructions.title: Use Boosters Wisely
instructions.description: Collect boosters and use them strategically to overcome challenging levels and obstacles. Save powerful boosters for the most difficult situations.

instructions.title: Plan Your Moves
instructions.description: Think ahead and plan your moves carefully. Sometimes the best move isn't the most obvious one. Look for opportunities to create cascading combinations.

instructions.title: Master the Grid
instructions.description: Learn how blocks fall and plan your strategy accordingly. Understanding the grid mechanics will help you create amazing combinations and achieve higher scores.

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.comment: This game is absolutely addictive! The safari theme is so much fun and the puzzles are challenging but fair. I've been playing for months and still discovering new strategies.

testimonials.name: Mike R.
testimonials.comment: Love the animal characters and the boosters make the game really exciting. Perfect for puzzle lovers! The graphics are beautiful and the gameplay is smooth.

testimonials.name: Emma L.
testimonials.comment: Great graphics and smooth gameplay. The level progression keeps me coming back for more! I love how each level feels unique and challenging.

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.comment: The safari theme is brilliant! I love matching the different animals and the boosters add a great strategic element. Highly recommend for anyone who loves puzzle games.

testimonials.name: Lisa P.
testimonials.comment: Perfect game to relax with after a long day. The beautiful graphics and satisfying match sounds make it very therapeutic. Can't stop playing!

animals.name: Lion
animals.description: The king of the jungle with powerful matching abilities. Lion blocks are strong and can create powerful combinations when matched in groups.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: Mighty and wise, elephant blocks have the highest power level. They're rare but incredibly valuable for clearing difficult obstacles.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: Tall and graceful, giraffe blocks can reach across the grid to create unique matching opportunities and special combinations.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: Fast and agile, zebra blocks are common but essential. They're perfect for creating quick matches and building up your score.

animals.name: Hippo
animals.description: Strong and steady, hippo blocks are excellent for clearing obstacles and creating powerful chain reactions across the grid.

boosters.name: Lightning Strike
boosters.description: A powerful booster that clears an entire row or column instantly. Perfect for removing stubborn obstacles and creating space for new combinations.

boosters.name: Jungle Blast
boosters.description: Creates a massive explosion that clears all blocks within a 3x3 area. Great for clearing clustered obstacles and creating opportunities.

boosters.name: Safari Swap
boosters.description: Allows you to swap any two blocks on the grid, regardless of their position. Use strategically to create perfect combinations.

boosters.name: Wild Combo
boosters.description: Automatically finds and matches the best possible combination on the grid. Perfect for when you're stuck or need a quick boost.

levels.name: Welcome to Safari
levels.description: Your first adventure begins! Learn the basics of matching animal blocks in this gentle introduction to the safari world.

levels.name: First Steps
levels.description: Practice your matching skills with slightly more challenging puzzles. Discover the joy of creating special combinations.

levels.name: Animal Friends
levels.description: Meet more safari animals and learn about their unique abilities. This level introduces new mechanics and challenges.

levels.name: Jungle Challenge
levels.description: The jungle gets tougher! Face new obstacles and learn to use boosters effectively to overcome challenges.

levels.name: Savanna Master
levels.description: Prove your skills in this challenging level that combines all the mechanics you've learned so far.
